evidence.claim: Blitzz utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless deployment of its video support functionalities.
Blitzz's platform is designed with HIPAA compliance to ensure secure data handling in healthcare.
The integration of Twilio Video API allows for robust real-time video communication capabilities in the Blitzz platform.
Blitzz's use of RESTful APIs further enhances interoperability with EHR systems and other healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or healthcare clearinghouse functions found.
